description: Jessy, the Facilities Manager, proposes a new seating arrangement in an open office space and Bob, an Employee, decides whether to accept or reject the allocation. If rejected, the seating plan is delayed, and no changes are made.

proposer_behavior_choices.unequal_large: Allocate a larger and more private space for themselves and a smaller space for the employee
proposer_behavior_choices.moderate: Allocate a moderately-sized space for themselves and a slightly smaller space for the employee
proposer_behavior_choices.equal_split: Allocate equal-sized spaces for both parties

responder_behavior_choices.accept: Accept the space allocation and move to the new setup
responder_behavior_choices.reject: Reject the proposed allocation, resulting in maintaining the current setup
